itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 109-110 Part 2 : Dr. Brent Rogers
title: Doctrine & Covenants 109-110 Part 2 : Dr. Brent Rogers
description:
Dr. Brent Rogers returns and shares the Kirtland Temple dedicatory prayer and many spiritual manifestations witnessed by the Saints. Additionally, Dr. Rogers shares his testimony of the Savior, his thoughts about the Restoration, and the gathering of Israel.

Shownotes: https://followhim.co/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel

"Let Zion in Her Beauty Rise" by Marshall McDonald
https://www.marshallmcdonaldmusic.com/products/let-zion-in-her-beauty-rise-piano

Please rate and review the podcast.
